visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a pie chart displaying the composition of egg yolk. The chart should have a title 'Egg Yolk Composition' and a subtitle linking to a source. The pie chart should show the percentage of different components like Water, Fat, Carbohydrates, Protein, and Ash. The chart should use custom colors and patterns for each segment, with data labels formatted to show the name and percentage of each component. The tooltip should display the percentage with a '%' suffix and have a specific background and border color. The chart should also include a legend and allow point selection.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a pie chart that visualizes the composition of egg yolk. The chart is titled 'Egg Yolk Composition' and includes a subtitle with a link to the source of the data. The pie chart displays the percentage of different components: Water, Fat, Carbohydrates, Protein, and Ash. Each segment of the pie chart uses custom colors and patterns, with the 'Fat' segment initially sliced and selected. Data labels are enabled to show the name and percentage of each component, formatted to one decimal place. The tooltip displays the percentage with a '%' suffix and has a specific background and border color. The chart also includes a legend and allows users to select individual segments for further interaction.
